markdown:
| icon              = poe2 blade_of_the_endless_paths_icon.png
| description       = An Aedyran explorer once heard a legend of an Engwithan tomb filled with the dead empire’s greatest treasures. Dead-set on making a name and a fortune for himself, he had one of the finest smiths in the Dyrwood craft a blade worthy of his task.

He descended into a place known as the Endless Paths of Od Nua and was never heard from again. His possessions were scattered by the strange evils that dwelled within and his priceless blade was shattered. Eventually the Watcher of Caed Nua recovered the shards and reforged the weapon.
| added_in          = poe2
| equipment_slot    = Weapon
| weapon_type       = Estoc
| requirements      = 
| is_soulbound      = 
| is_unique         = yes
| value             = 1514
| shop_value        = 7570
| combat_type       = Melee
| range             = 
| handing           = Two-handed
| attack_time       = 0.7
| recovery_time     = 4
| penetration       = 11
| projectiles       = 
| accuracy_mod      = 
| damage            = 18-29 
| damage_type       = Pierce
| weapon_bonuses    = 
| curr_enchantments = Exceptional weapon (Deadfire){{!}}Exceptional;Quickened Blade;Seeker's Prize
| weapon_focus      =
| poss_enchantments = 
| rel_quests        = 
| rel_items         = Blade of the Endless Paths;Fragments of Blade of the Endless Paths
| rel_abilities     = 
| rel_talents       = 
| internalname      = Estoc_U_Blade_of_the_Endless_Paths
| location          = * This weapon can be obtained when the [Fragments of Blade of the Endless Paths](/fragmentsOfBladeOfTheEndlessPaths/) are repaired by [Marihi](/marihi/) of [Periki's Overlook](/perikisOverlook/) in [Neketaka](/neketaka/).
| guid              = de09de56-a949-4636-922a-cf66afc1d859
}}
